definition: cheapskate/stingy person
iron (metal)/arms/weapons/hard/strong/violent/unshakeable/determined/close/tight (slang)
surname Tie

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
fowl/chicken/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(slang) prostitute

sentences.english: Sheila's dad is a real tight wad.
sentences.chinese: 希拉的父親真是個一毛不拔的鐵公雞。

sentences.english: A cotton wad that was impregnated with ether.
sentences.chinese: 希拉的父親真是個一毛不拔的鐵公雞。

sentences.english: An iron rooster in Chinese means miserly.
sentences.chinese: 鐵公雞在漢語中的意思是一毛不拔。

sentences.english: A black iron cock sits on the spire of the town church.
sentences.chinese: 一隻黑色的鐵公雞坐在村裏教堂的塔尖上。

sentences.english: Even if you can't admit to Japan also impossible what all don't buy.
sentences.chinese: 即使你再怎麼鐵公雞，到了日本也不可能什麼都不買。

sentences.english: Miser and rust, you TMD is a stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 鐵公雞還有生鏽的時候，你TMD簡直是個不鏽鋼的。

sentences.english: There was once a very poor person who was also very stingy.
sentences.chinese: 從前有個又窮又鐵公雞的人向上帝禱告。
